ygData.messageBody:
Before LoY, certain kinds of armor were dyable. Off
the top of my head, the only ones I can think of were
fine plate (which not many people wear anymore). I
don't know exactly how the dyes were made, but I'm
pretty sure brewing was a part of it,and the
componants were dropped from mobs, for the most part.

With LoY, all armor can be dyed. I've only done a
little dying, but if I remember right, it requires
pottery and brewing, neither of which has to be *too*
high, but maybe at least around a skill of 100. The
dye is called Prismatic Dye, and you can usually find
someone selling it in the bazaar.

Once you have the dye, all you do it open your
inventory, and at the bottom there is a "dye" button.
Just click on that, then pick the piece you want to
dye, and it does it for you automatically, as long as
the vial of dye is in your inventory.

(and if I had bothered to read all this thread, I
would have seen that some of this info was already
given to you. Bad cleric, no cookie for you. hehe)

> expansion to dye armor

>
> --- In EverQuest@yahoogroups.com, "Randy"
> <morat68@y...> wrote:
> > EQtraders.com is the best place to learn recipes
> for tradeskills.
> > The Plains root and water flask combination will
> make Plains Dye.
> > This is used for LoY tailored robes not to dye
> armor.
> > If want you are wanting to do is change the color
> of visible armor
> > on your toon, then here is what you need to do:
> >
> > First, you need the LoY expansion.(just a
> reminder)
> > Now time to make some stuff:
> > In a kiln put a Unfired Vial and a High
> Quality Firing Sheet
> > the trivial on this is 54. (pottery skill)
> > In a brew barrel or medicine bag combine a
> Prism Shard and
> Glaze
> > Lacquer, this is also trivial at 54. (brewing
> skill)
> > You now will have a Dye Vial and Prismatic
> Dye, combine these
> two
> > items in a brew barrel or medicine bag. trivial at
> 68
> >
> > On your inventory screen there is a button that
> says dye. This is
> > used to pick the color to dye your armor.
> >
